title: SES government unit rebranded as SES Space & Defense
summary: The U.S.-based subsidiary of satellite operator SES has been renamed to reflect the company’s focus on the national security market.

title: NASA Selects Eastern Region Protective Services Contractor
summary: NASA has selected Chenega Global Protection, LLC. of Chantilly, Virginia, to receive the NASA Protective Services – Eastern Region contract. The

title: Collins Aerospace selected to develop new space station spacesuit
summary: NASA has selected Collins Aerospace to develop a next-generation spacesuit for the International Space Station, replacing aging suits that have become a safety concern.

title: NASA Taps Collins Aerospace to Develop New Space Station Spacesuits
summary: NASA has awarded a task order to Collins Aerospace to deliver a spacewalking system for potential use outside the International Space Station.

title: Terran Orbital creates new business unit to produce imaging satellites
summary: Satellite manufacturer Terran Orbital has formed a new business unit that will produce electro-optical imaging satellites.
